data.title: Mel Ferrer Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Mel Ferrer on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Mel Ferrer including The Longest Day, Brannigan, and more.
data.text:
Requiem for a Falling Star

Anne Baxter and Mel Ferrer guest star as a fading actress and a Hollywood gossip columnist whose hatred of each other culminates in murder. Peter Falk stars in the title role.

Widow, Weep for Me

Jessica masquerades as a wealthy widow at a luxurious tropical hotel in an effort to trap the murderer of her good friend.

Weave A Tangled Web

While attending a New York party, Jessica (Angela Lansbury) discovers that a steadfast Cabot Cove resident is apparently leading a double life. George Chakiris and Mel Ferrer guest star.

Mormon Story

Zeb sides with the Sioux after the Russian incident triggers a war - and the clash leads to a great leader's sacrifice. Luke's feelings for Hillary Gant intensify, but when her father learns of Luke's past, he asks Luke to leave. Laura accepts a marriage proposal, while Luke finds himself forced to join a thieving band of ex-Confederates.

Jenna's Return

Sue Ellen actively sees Dusty, Pam leaves town and an angry husband who runs into Jenna, an old girl friend, while Ray ponders if he and Donna have anything in common besides their love. J.R. finds himself angry and jealous of Sue Ellen's unexplained nights out as Kristin tries to take advantage of the situation and permanently enters J.R.'s life.
